name: Amazing Hexagon Fit Puzzle V3
description:
Amazing Hexagon Fit Puzzle V3 is a game that you’ll love. Block of bite hexa fun puzzle for everyday play. This is the mix type gameplay between jigsaw puzzle game and block puzzle game. Place your hexagon, hexus or hexa block in the field.
Easy rule but unlimited fun link!


HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the frame
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Don't worry! No time limits!
